displayProperties.name: Refracted Lesson
displayProperties.description: Open your mind to the Traveler's teaching through meditation.

displayProperties.name: : Zone Control
displayProperties.description:
"There will come a day when the Tower falls again. Our ability to hold territory is paramount." —Lord Saladin

Capture zones to increase points for each opponent defeated. Capture all three to lock the zones and hunt your opponents.

displayProperties.name: The Wellspring: Attack
displayProperties.description: Stop Bor'gong, Warden of the Spring from completing the ritual at the Wellspring.

displayProperties.name: Gambit
displayProperties.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity, collect their Motes, and bank them to summon a Primeval. First team to destroy their Primeval wins.

displayProperties.name: Showdown
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by defeating opponents and preventing revives. Win the most rounds or face off in an elimination showdown.

displayProperties.name: The Wellspring: Attack
displayProperties.description: Stop Golmag, Warden of the Spring from completing the ritual at the Wellspring.

displayProperties.name: Operation: Seraph's Shield: Normal
displayProperties.description: Infiltrate Seraph Station in Earth's orbit to plant a virus in the Warsat network.

displayProperties.name: Legacy: Forsaken: Last Call
displayProperties.description: Fight alongside Cayde-6 to help Petra Venj regain control of the dangerous Prison of Elders.

displayProperties.name: High Plains Blues
displayProperties.description: Search the Tangled Shore for Cayde's killers.

displayProperties.name: Clash
displayProperties.description: Fight for victory by defeating opponents.

displayProperties.name: Trials of Osiris
displayProperties.description: Compete in an event version of Elimination. Earn as many round and match wins on a ticket as you can.

displayProperties.name: The Investigation: Classic
displayProperties.description: Venture into Savathûn's Light-blessed throne world to investigate how she acquired the Light.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Ops
displayProperties.description: The Vanguard seeks Guardians to undertake high-priority missions against the City's enemies.

displayProperties.name: Pit of Heresy: Master
displayProperties.description: Deep beneath Sorrow's Harbor, the Hive keep their darkest secrets.

displayProperties.name: Pit of Heresy: Legend
displayProperties.description: Deep beneath Sorrow's Harbor, the Hive keep their darkest secrets.

displayProperties.name: Countdown
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by detonating a charge, defusing the opposing charge, or eliminating all opponents.

displayProperties.name: Momentum Control
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by capturing zones and defeating opponents. All weapons are more lethal; abilities replenish only with targets defeated, and tracker is disabled.

displayProperties.name: Europa Sabotage
displayProperties.description: Help the Vanguard destabilize what remains of House Salvation by sabotaging an important Fallen weapons factory.

displayProperties.name: Nightfall Grandmaster: Birthplace of the Vile
Operation: Seraph's Shield (Legend)
displayProperties.description: Uncover Seraph Station's secrets to upgrade Revision Zero.

displayProperties.name: Altar of Reflection: Catalyst
displayProperties.description: Witness the memory linked to the Enigma. The entry point is located deep within the Temple of the Wrathful.

displayProperties.name: Altar of Reflection: Insight
displayProperties.description: Revisit the memory linked to the Tablet of Ruin. The entry point is located deep within the Sepulcher Lost Sector.

displayProperties.name: Altar of Reflection: Choice
displayProperties.description: Revisit the memory linked to the crystal shard. The entry point is located deep within the Metamorphosis Lost Sector.

displayProperties.name: Altar of Reflection: Pact
displayProperties.description: Revisit the memory linked to Sagira's shell. The entry point is located deep within the Extraction Lost Sector.

displayProperties.name: Rift
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by collecting the Spark and igniting the opponent's Rift.

displayProperties.name: The Arrival: Legendary
displayProperties.description: Track Savathûn on Mars, where temporal abnormalities scar the planet's surface and the Cabal seek to claim new territory.

displayProperties.name: Iron Banner
displayProperties.description:
"Pressure builds with each enemy felled. No one will be safe from the eruption." —Lord Saladin

Earn streaks to generate score multipliers. Max out your streak to erupt!

displayProperties.name: Empire Hunt: The Warrior
displayProperties.description: Defeat Eramis's military commander, Phylaks, the Warrior.

displayProperties.name: Guardian Games: Recreational Playlist: Normal
displayProperties.description: Earn Laurels, Medallions, and Vanguard Medals as you compete for individual distinction and class supremacy.

displayProperties.name: The Arms Dealer
displayProperties.description: Stifle the legacy of a notorious ironmonger providing weapons to the Shadow Legion.

displayProperties.name: Freelance: Gambit
displayProperties.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity, collect their Motes, and bank them to summon a Primeval. First team to destroy their Primeval wins.

displayProperties.description: Venture into Savathûn's Light-blessed throne world to investigate how she acquired the Light.

displayProperties.name: The Shattered Throne

Invasion Swap: Opponent Mote deposits open your team's invasion portal!

displayProperties.name: Rift
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by collecting the Spark and igniting the opponent's Rift.

displayProperties.name: Supremacy
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by defeating opponents and securing the crests they drop. Recover friendly crests to deny them from opponents.

displayProperties.name: Empire Hunt: The Dark Priestess: Adept
displayProperties.description: Defeat the new leader of the Fallen, Kridis, the Dark Priestess.

displayProperties.name: Preservation
displayProperties.description: Enter the Throne World Pyramid and prevent the Scorn from reclaiming its power.

displayProperties.name: Rumble
displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by defeating opponents. No teams. No allegiance. A free-for-all where the leader had better watch their back.

displayProperties.name: Lake of Shadows
displayProperties.description: Purge the European Dead Zone of the Taken and Shadow Legion forces threatening to overtake the Reservoir and poison the precious water it holds.

displayProperties.name: Scorned
displayProperties.description: Follow Spider's tip to the Scorned Barons' hideout and avenge Cayde-6.

displayProperties.name: Simulation: Survival
displayProperties.description: Simulated Skill-Set Training: Survive the harsh weather as you take down the Vex.

displayProperties.description:

displayProperties.description: Achieve victory by controlling zones, earning points for your team over time.

displayProperties.name: Trials Labs
displayProperties.description: Compete in an event version of Elimination. Earn as many round and match wins on a ticket as you can.

displayProperties.name: Freelance: Competitive
displayProperties.description:
"Here, you will find yourself closely matched with your fellow Guardians. Here, steel sharpens steel to its finest!"—Lord Shaxx

Matches in this playlist affect your Competitive Division placement. Wins will lead to Promotions, increasing your Division placement. Losses will lead to Relegations, lowering your Division placement.

displayProperties.name: Team Quickplay
displayProperties.description:
"Triumph is shaped by the understanding of many engagements, not just one. By broad experience, a Guardian grows."—Lord Shaxx

This playlist cycles through the following 6v6 game modes: Control and Clash.

displayProperties.name: Nightmare Hunt: Isolation
displayProperties.description: Defeat the Nightmare of Taniks, the Scarred.
